attributes.action: encourage the BBC to show more women's sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the BBC shows very little women's sport at peaks times. It seems unfair and unjust that women's sporting achievements go unnoticed where as mens are widely broadcasted.

rejection.details: We suggest you write to the BBC with your suggestion in the first instance.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
